title: Metal-free approach for imidazole synthesis via one-pot N-α-C(sp3)–H bond functionalization of benzylamines
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28332-28339
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03939D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Vikas D. Kadu, Machhindra S. Thokal, Rajkumar K. Godase, Bhagyashree C. Kotali, Pooja S. Wadkar
A metal-free one-pot method is established for the synthesis of tetrasubstituted imidazoles from the reaction of arylmethylamines and 1,2-dicarbonyls/benzoin.
